title: Bug 2940 - Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description: Bug 2940 - Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)1.
OB: The checked state of the table takes a long time (30 seconds in my case) to update.
EB: The table should update the checked state more efficiently, and a busy cursor should be shown during the update.
SR:
1. In a workspace with many projects, go to Export Zip.
2. Select all projects.
3. Choose file types.
4. Press OK.
